segments.text: Hello , can I speak to Mark Wyatt , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry . I can ’ t hear your very clearly . Could you say that again , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mark Wyatt ? I am sorry . The line is terrible.Could you spell that for me , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: W-Y-A-T-T , Got it . I haven ’ t heard of the name.Could you hold on the line when I check .
segments.speaker: S2
